```{r}
library(tswge)
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)

x <- list()

for(i in 1:10){
  x[[i]] <- gen.arima.wge(200, phi=0.9, theta=0.5, d=0,s=0,mu=0,vara=1,plot=F,sn=0)
  print(arima(x[[i]], order = c(1,0,1), method = "CSS-ML"))
  print(arima(x[[i]], order = c(1,0,1), method = "ML"))
  print(arima(x[[i]], order = c(1,0,1), method = "CSS"))
  cat("-----------------------------------------------------------------------------\n")
}
```
